C ya, Logo.

::Rex::

Rex looks at the fruit, watching as Battera bends down to pick it up. He 
sighs.

"I want to apologize for my behaviour on the bridge," he says to her, "I 
shouldn't have acted that way. Even in front of a potential threat."
